alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 27 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, Chase, Frontier and Hayes. * WHEN...From Midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight to 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with heavy rain are becoming more likely across Chase, Hayes, and Frontier counties late tonight. These areas remain saturated from excessive rainfall and flooding on Friday. Any additional heavy rainfall late tonight into Sunday morning may result in Flash Flooding. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
